transcript:
Customer: Hello, Rishu naam.
Executive: Hello sir, sorry call was disconnected. To sir I just wanted to know ki aapka ye issue number se related hi tha ya kuch aur issue bhi face kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi bas issue number se hi tha.
Executive: Matlab aapko number se related issue tha. To ye concern sir aapka number se related main ye close kar sakti hu aapka?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Accha sir ek thing aur janna tha aapse. Jaise sir hamara jo product hai NC thinner, wood polish, wood polish thinner but aap jo buylead zyada consume kar rahe ho wo NC thinner mein hi kar rahe ho sir. To kya abhi jaise wood polish hai ya wooden polish aapke thinner hai inme aap buylead wagera nahi check karna chahte ho kya sir?
Customer: Check karte hain wohi main actually time nahi de pa raha hu. Actually main dusre kaam mein thoda time nahi de pa raha hu buylead attend karne ke liye. Isi wajah se main actually main unko number de raha hu he can attend all the buyleads what they are required. To aisa hota hai ki main isliye unko logging kar raha hu mere 94 number mein unka agar main buyleads unko aane de wo unko wo khali specially marketing dekhte hain to wo marketing hisab se wo attend kar sakte hain sara buyleads.
Executive: Okay okay okay. To aap chah rahe hain sir ki jaise aap busy hain to wo aapke behalf pe services wagera ko check kar le hai na sir?
Customer: Haan ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan ji ab sir ek cheez one thing more jaise abhi hamari jo account ki rating hai sir that is 4.3 right sir? To which is good but you can maintain further ki like aapko ek customer hai jinhone ye wooden polish thinner pe na aapko negative marking kari hai matlab they they shared you the rating of one right? To I would I just want to clear like if you will get na more positive rating to that rating will increase sir like it will be come 4.5 or 4.9 to that would be good good rating sir. So you can understand sir right now market mein buyer rating ko bhi bahut importance deta hai agar aapki rating acchi hai sir to usse aapko accha response milega right?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: And sir ek cheez ye hai paint thinners na bahut types ke hote hain. To kya aap sabhi tarike ke paint thinners mein
Customer: Sab sab sab tarike ke paint thinner mein use karta hu.
Executive: Main cheez main do cheez main attend karna chahta hu madam main bata raha hu within Odisha whereas my farm is in Odisha within Odisha I can attend minimum amount of 10000 above order. And out of Odisha I can I could attend above 50000 se 1 lakh. Above 50000 I can attend out of Odisha.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Ab out of Odisha ka jo buyleads aa rahi hai wo agar 5-6 din ka ek piece aa raha hai to usko main attend nahi kar paunga. Wohi sabse badi dikkat hai.
Executive: Okay okay okay. Sir aap all over India deal karte hain waise matlab aapki preference all over India hai?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ji.
Executive: To sir yaha pe na do option hai dekhiye jab aap buylead pe jaate ho na sir to buylead pe jaake aap sabse pehle jab India pe aur recent pe filter lagayenge. Theek hai sir? To waha pe aap kya kar sakte hain na jab jab aap India aur recent pe filter lagaye to waha pe bulk inquiry ka filter hota hai theek hai? Bulk inquiry aur order order value wala to jab bhi aap India page pe lead search kare to aap order value ya filter ka use kar sakte hain.
Customer: Main karta hu main karta hu main jo time bhi use karta hu usi ko hi dekhta hu. Thoda wo jo jo requirement aati hai wo karta hu.
Executive: Okay okay. To matlab aap use kar rahe hain baki sir local ke liye aap sirf Odisha ka filter lagayenge aur local mein lead search kariye to waha se aapko local ki lead dikh jayengi hai na sir? To ye cheez aap check kar sakte ho. Baki sir koi naye product wagera aap add karna chahte hain ya sare product aapke added hain kuch aur aap
Customer: Nahi nahi sare product sare product added hain jab koi new product added hoga to main aapko kal kal back kar lunga.
Executive: Sir abhi ye aapka concern jo mere paas aaya hai isko close kar sakti hu main sir?
Customer: Ji ji thank you thank you madam.
Executive: Sir ye na abhi is call ke baad na ek feedback aapke number pe aayega sir. To agar aap satisfied hain to aap yes mark kar dena and sir ek request aur hai aapse next time agar aapko kuch bhi issue hota hai na to aap ye number mera save rakh lijiye. Mera naam Rishu hai aur main aapka account relationship manager hu. To aapko directly is number pe call karenge to mere paas hi call aayega sir hai na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To aap is number pe call kar lena theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir abhi yes ka jo feedback aayega na please aap usko zarur share kar dena mere ko theek hai sir?
Customer: Zarur zarur kar lunga ji.
Executive: Thank you thank you so much sir have a good day sir have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had an issue related to number.

- Wants to check buyleads for wood polish.

- Wants to attend buyleads within Odisha.

- Cannot attend to small orders out of Odisha.

- Wants to deal all over India.

- Received negative marking on wooden polish thinner.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the concern related to number.

- Executive explained how to check buyleads.

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive explained the importance of ratings.

- Executive requested to save her number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, rating, filters, products
